data.body:
Everyone is Going Crazy Over This High Speed Portable Wi-Fi Router.

Muama Ryoko is a pocket size wireless modem, which creates a Wi-Fi network around itself using 4G LTE. And you can have your own Internet anywhere, anytime.
Get Muama Ryoko with your FREE SIM card now!

Why Is This Little Gadget So Special?

It is the most effective way to have your own secured Internet connection anywhere, anytime! Muama Ryoko arrives ready to use with a SIM card already pre-installed. Just turn it on and use! Enjoy cheap, safe, high-speed 4G connections in more than 38 countries.
Get Muama Ryoko with your FREE SIM card now!

data.body:
Portable Wireless 4G Router. No wires, no limits!


Ryoko is a portable, high-tech solution to all of your WiFi needs. This tiny device removes the hassle of connecting to various unsafe public WiFi hotspots - with the Ryoko WiFi router you can connect your favourite WiFi-enabled devices and experience the ease of bringing your own secured network connection in your pocket everywhere, anytime!


Get Yours with 70% OFF
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may unsubscribe by clicking here
or by writing to Gedimino st. 45-7, LT-44239, Kaunas, Lithuania

data.body:
>

Get Internet Anywhere With This Amazing Device

Every year, hackers, using public WiFi and fake WiFi hotspots, steal over 1.2 Billion USD, as well as lots of gigabytes of personal data. Financial fraud specialists agree that 67% of people have used insecure public WiFi in the last 6 months, putting themselves at risk of loosing their personal data, pictures, documents, and money. As public WiFi becomes increasingly common, you can expect Internet security issues to grow. Wouldn't it be amazing to have an ultimate, personal WiFi wherever you go?


What if WE tell you we've got a solution, called MUAMA Ryoko?

? With the portable Ryoko WiFi you can now create your own WPA2 secured personal WiFi
? Be connected and PROTECTED anywhere, and share it with others when travelling for business or on holiday, when outdoors, or even replace your home DSL coverage
? Keep yourself and close ones safe your - with Muama Ryoko, share your WiFi Internet access with up to 8 devices

You will be able to connect to your tablet, mobile phone, handset, gaming console, laptop, and many more.
Share a secure connection with your friends and family!

GET YOURS WHILE STOCK LASTS
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may unsubscribe by clicking here
or by writing to Gedimino st. 45-7, LT-44239, Kaunas, Lithuania

Why Everyone is Going Crazy Over This High Speed Portable WiFi Router





- Muama Ryoko saves your money and our time as it arrives ready to use with a SIM card already pre-installed with 500 mb of free mobile data
+ prepaid
+ free of roaming charges

- Muama Ryoko keeps you connected in over 100 countries with unlimited internet


-  Muama Ryoko always uses the fastest 4G LTE connection available


- Muama Ryoko connects up to 10 devices - your laptop, phone, tablet


- Muama Ryoko allows you to feel SAFE and SECURE wherever you are, always

The best way to stay connected on the go.

One-touch access to the internet in over 137 countries around the world.

Stay powered-on all day with up to 8 hours of WiFi battery life.
